org.transitime.avl

Class AvlModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.modules.Module
      • org.transitime.avl.AvlModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GtfsRealtimeModule, XmlPollingAvlModule

    public abstract class AvlModule
extends Module
    Subclass of Module to be used when reading AVL data from a feed. Only functionality is that the module is only run if not in playback mode.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Does all of the work for the class.
      void start()
      Calls the Module.start() method, but only if not in playback mode

      • Methods inherited from class org.transitime.modules.Module

        start, start

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Calls the Module.start() method, but only if not in playback mode
        Overrides:
        start in class Module

      • run

        public void run()
        Does all of the work for the class. Runs forever and reads in AVL data from feed and writes it to the appropriate JMS topic so that AVL clients can access it.
        See Also:
        Runnable.run()
